r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Fixed: Fetching of mixed character data when the application code page different from database code page Fixed: db2-bind-param with INOUT LOB parameters Enhanced: Enable iSeries system naming mode from LUW to iSeries Enhanced: Clear global error state at end of request
